publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-539 Margo MacDonald: Holyrood Inquiry-That the Parliament agrees to hold a debate on the Holyrood Inquiry and, in relation to this debate, agrees that under section 23 of the Scotland Act 1998 the producers and commissioning body for the planned BBC Scotland programme "The Gathering Place" should be required to produce the videotaped recordings of interviews conducted for possible inclusion in the programme.
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Dennis Canavan*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Campbell Martin*, John Swinburne*, Ms Sandra White*, Donald Gorrie*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Alex Neil*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Dr Jean Turner*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Elaine Smith*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Ms Rosemary Byrne*
S2M-539 Holyrood Inquiry (lodged on 31 October 2003) Mike Pringle*
